FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for an E-Trunk.
The undo description command restores the default setting.
By default, no E-Trunk description is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of an E-Trunk.
The value is a string of 1 to 242 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a description for an E-Trunk, run the description command. The description can contain the name of the remote device, which facilitates maintenance.
